AboutUs.headline: Zodiacs Rent a Car
AboutUs.intro: Zodiacs Rent a Car is a family-run Hungarian business, with its heart and home in Fuerteventura. We live and work in an international environment, yet we know exactly what matters to travelers coming here: safety, reliability and a friendly attitude.
AboutUs.why_text: For us, this island is not just a tourist destination, it’s our home. We love the sunshine, the ocean, the relaxed lifestyle and the sense of endless freedom. We’d like you to experience the same when you rent a car from us.
AboutUs.fleet_text: In our fleet you’ll find practical small cars, family models and even roomier vehicles. We regularly service and clean every car so you can explore the island without worries.
AboutUs.delivery_text: You can pick up your rental not only in Fuerteventura, but also in Lanzarote. Whether you arrive at the airport or stay at a hotel, we’ll deliver the car flexibly so your trip starts comfortably.
AboutUs.more_text: With us, car rental is more than handing over the keys. If you need, we help with itineraries, local tips and show you where to go to feel the real Fuerteventura vibe: hidden coves, sandy beaches, unique landscapes and culinary experiences.
AboutUs.mission_text: Our goal is for every guest to experience the island freely, comfortably and safely. As a family and local business we work with heart and soul so you can take home Fuerteventura’s special atmosphere.

Contact.title: Have a question about car rental in Fuerteventura or Lanzarote?
Contact.p1: Get in touch and we’ll help you find the best solution for you! Whether it’s pre-booking, airport delivery or handover at your hotel, our support responds quickly and flexibly.
Contact.p2: Fill out the form below, send us an email, Messenger, WhatsApp or Viber message, or give us a call! We’re happy to help so your holiday can be worry-free.

Cars.title: Discover Fuerteventura and Lanzarote in complete freedom with our cars!
Cars.p1: Renting a car with us is simple and fast: choose the vehicle that suits you and we’ll deliver it to the airport or directly to your hotel. Thanks to our flexible rental options you can enjoy your holiday worry-free, whether you need a car for a short or a longer stay.
Cars.p2: It’s worth booking your chosen car in advance so it’s guaranteed to be available on arrival. Browse our cars below, click for details and book online with ease!
